### PAR Table Total Adjusted for Age and Sex (ntotal = 2070371, nfall = 31244)

```{r, include = FALSE}
dt1 = read_csv("./dt1.csv")
dt2 = read_csv("./dt2.csv")
dt3 = read_csv("./dt3.csv")
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
cbind(dt1, dt2, dt3) %>% 
  knitr::kable(booktabs = T) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "scale_down")) %>% 
  add_header_above(c(" ", "Male (ntotal = 977304, nfall = 14686)" = 4,
                     "Female (ntotal = 1093067, nfall = 16558)" = 4, 
                     "Total" = 2)) %>% 
  add_indent(c(2, 3, 8:11, 13, 14, 16, 17, 22, 24:26, 32, 33, 37, 40:42)) %>% 
  row_spec(c(1, 7, 12, 15, 21, 23, 31, 36, 39), bold = TRUE)
```
